p: Meanwhile, the genetic code analysis revealed the SARS-CoV-2 to be most closely related to 2 bat SARS-like coronavirus samples, similar to MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV; there is evidence of mutation before infecting people; additionally, comprehensive bioinformatics scrutiny implied probability of SARS-CoV-2 to have arisen from snakes. Nonetheless, evidence of human to human transmission published [34], [38], [39].
